title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: Enhancing Critical Interpretation of Data Visualization Misinformation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical concepts and experience with fundamental data visualization tools
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify and explain 14 types of misinformation visualization cases
Learners achieve over 80% accuracy in detecting key misinformation techniques, including axis manipulation (inverted y-axis, uneven x-axis intervals) and multi-axis usage
Regardless of data literacy level, learners can derive correct statistical interpretations from misinformation visualizations
Learners can apply critical review processes to real-world workplace data visualizations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
